mapper.select: SELECT EMP_CODE, EMP_NO, EMP_ID, EMP_PW, EMP_LAST_NAME, EMP_FIRST_NAME, PHONE, EMP_ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(EMP_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') EMP_BIRTH, TO_CHAR(HIRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') HIRE_DATE, CONTRACT_TYPE, EMP_TEL, WORK_PLACE, EMP_EMAIL, PROFILE_IMG, GENERAL_MANAGER, C.COM_NO, C.COM_NM, C.COM_LOGO, TEAM_NM, POSITION_NM FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN COMPANY C ON(C.COM_NO = E.COM_NO) JOIN TEAM USING(TEAM_NO) JOIN POSITION USING(POSITION_NO) WHERE EMP_DEL_FL = 'N' AND EMP_ID = #{empId}
